abstract: Alibaba Group of China on Saturday criticized Yahoo, one of its largest shareholders, for siding with Google after a cyber attack.
snippet: Alibaba Group of China on Saturday criticized Yahoo, one of its largest shareholders, for siding with Google after a cyber attack.
lead_paragraph: In an unusual move, the Alibaba Group of China on Saturday criticized Yahoo, one of its largest shareholders, for siding with Google after a cyber attack on that company, The New York Times’s David Barboza and Miguel Helft report.

headline.main: Alibaba Criticizes Investor Yahoo for Google Support
